com.gino.contractor.controllers

Class ContractorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gino.contractor.controllers.ContractorController

  • @Controller
public class ContractorController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class that provides access to database. It inherits the Service, Repository and Utility classes
    Author:
    Gino Ruperez

      • showCreate

        @RequestMapping(value="/showCreate")
public java.lang.String showCreate()

      • saveContractor

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveCon")
public java.lang.String saveContractor(@ModelAttribute(value="contractor")
                                                                          Contractor contractor,
                                                                          org.springframework.ui.ModelMap modelMap)
        the ModelAttribute is used to capture the inputs from jsp and convert them into an object. the RequestMapping is used to map to jsp file to be used as url input, but the actual jsp should be the return string.
        Parameters:
        contractor -
        modelMap -
        Returns:
        String value that corresponds to the name of jsp

public java.lang.String deleteContractor(@RequestParam(value="id")

        the @RequestParam is used to get the value of id from the el displayContractor.jsp the ModelMap is responsible for sending the response to jsp file to be consumed using el

        id -
        modelMap -
        Returns:
